description: This file defines a GameProvider class that extends ChangeNotifier to manage and notify about the state of a 2048 game, specifically tracking score and best score, with methods to reset and update the score.

classes.name: GameProvider
classes.description: A provider class managing game score state for a 2048 game, notifying listeners on state changes.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the current score to zero and notifies listeners.

methods.name: addToScore
methods.description: Increments the score by a specified delta and updates the best score if necessary, then notifies listeners.

methods.name: best
methods.description: Getter for the best score achieved.
